SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the clockwise direction from Route Efficiency ?
SRP.A: The next dimension clockwise from Route Efficiency  is Damage/Loss Rate

SRP.Q: In the radar chart, what is the next dimension in the counterclockwise direction from Service Coverage Rate?
SRP.A: The next dimension counterclockwise from Route Efficiency  is Customer Satisfaction .

VPR.Q: What are the strongest and weakest dimension of Nelson-Hahn?
